posts.title: 论文发表 | AdvMOB: 基于数字孪生技术的广告牌曝光分析交互可视化系统
posts.title_en: Paper published | AdvMOB: Interactive Visual Analytic System for Billboard Advertising Exposure Analysis Based on Digital Twin Technology
posts.brief: 近期于《Advanced Engineering Informatics》发表论文《AdvMOB 基于数字孪生技术的广告牌曝光分析交互可视化系统》
posts.brief_en: Recently published a paper in 'Advanced Engineering Informatics' titled 'AdvMOB: Interactive Visual Analytic System for Billboard Advertising Exposure Analysis Based on Digital Twin Technology'

posts.title: 讲座预告 | 建筑一体化光伏潜力的全球估算：基于三维建筑数据的研究
posts.title_en: Lecture Preview | Global Estimation of Building Integrated Photovoltaic Potentia
posts.brief: 2024年12月16日于瑞典梅拉达伦大学
posts.brief_en: at Mälardalen University, Sweden on December 16, 2024

posts.title: 课题获中国博士后科学基金第76批面上资助
posts.title_en: Project Granted by the 76th of general funding from the China Postdoctoral Science Foundation
posts.brief: 《基于多源时空数据的城市充电基础设施系统韧性时空特征及演变机制研究》获中国博士后科学基金第76批面上资助
posts.brief_en: The project 'Research on the Resilience Spatiotemporal Characteristics and Evolution Mechanism of Urban Charging Infrastructure System Based on Multi-source Spatiotemporal Data' won the 76th of general funding from the China Postdoctoral Science Foundation

posts.title: 论文发表 | 基于轨迹数据的电动汽车充电和能耗模式行为建模
posts.title_en: Paper published | Modeling electric vehicle behavior: Insights from long-term charging and energy consumption patterns through empirical trajectory data
posts.brief: 通过长期实证数据分析和分类不同类型电动汽车的充电行为，揭示电动汽车在空间和时间维度上的规律性充电模式与潜在需求
posts.brief_en: Through long-term empirical data analysis and classification of charging behaviors of different types of electric vehicles, reveal the regular charging patterns and potential demand of electric vehicles in spatial and temporal dimensions

posts.title: 论文发表 | 通过物联网人工智能（AIoT）、地理信息系统（GIS）和气象学的协同作用，推进建筑立面太阳能潜力评估
posts.title_en: Paper published | Advancing building facade solar potential assessment through AIoT, GIS, and meteorology synergy
posts.brief: 通过结合物联网人工智能（AIoT）、地理信息系统（GIS）和气象数据，提出了一种创新方法，精确评估建筑立面光伏潜力，考虑了三维遮挡效应和城市环境因素。
posts.brief_en: By integrating Artificial Intelligence of Things (AIoT), Geographic Information Systems (GIS), and meteorological data, an innovative method is proposed to accurately assess building facade photovoltaic potential, considering 3D shading effects and urban environmental factors.

posts.title: 论文发表 | Nexus | 基于3D建筑足迹和时空数据的全球建筑一体化光伏电站潜力估算
posts.title_en: Article Publication | Nexus | Global estimation of building-integrated facade and rooftop photovoltaic potential by integrating 3D building footprint and spatio-temporal datasets
posts.brief: 该研究通过整合3D建筑模型和时空数据集，评估了全球范围内建筑立面和屋顶光伏发电的潜力。
posts.brief_en: This research assesses the potential of building-integrated photovoltaics (BIPV) on building facades and rooftops globally by integrating 3D building models and spatio-temporal datasets.

posts.title: 论文发表 | TR part D | 高速公路收费折扣政策与路网扩建对碳排放的影响
posts.title_en: Article Publication | TR part D |Carbon Emission Implications of Toll Discount Policies and Network Expansions in Highway
posts.brief: 本研究通过整合ETC和GIS数据量化收费政策对高速公路碳排放的影响，发现货运转向高速公路可实现系统级减排。
posts.brief_en: This study quantifies toll policies' impacts on highway emissions using ETC-GIS integration, demonstrating system-wide reduction through optimized freight routing.
